tag_professor: Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CARING
comments: Great prof. Very caring. Some cons: 1) it is possible that she will not give feedback 2) maybe strict at times (I like it though). Apart from that be ready to do a lot of work on her class.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is a nice lady, very attentive to her students, and always smiling. She can grab attention of her students very easily and keep the environment busy so students do not get bored. The only \'bad\' history I remember is that I did not get any feedback on my essays except for the first one, so I was not able to work on my mistakes.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Dr. Betz\'s history of the German language ruined my 4.0 in German, but I easily learned the most in this class than any other in undergrad. She is a fantastic professor and a total professional. You will learn a ton in any of her courses, but be prepared to do the work.. a lot of work. However, she was always there when I needed help.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Awesome teacher! Dr Betz is extremely knowledgeable about all things language. She has a passion for her job and is willing to go above and beyond for her students - as long as you put in the effort. Challenging class but totally worth it.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Students who are there to learn will enjoy classes from Professor Betz. She\'s challenging, but very helpful and knowledgeable in subject matter. Works with students to achieve their specific educational goals. If you\'re just needing a class for credit and not that interested in the language, try to find a different section.
